home.title: Teams
home.creation.info: You can't create a team until you've saved your settings (personal details etc). Go to the settings page to update your details. Name and email details are required information.

team.created: A new Team has been created with identifier {{ param }}. The team needs to be manually accepted by admins.
team.updated: A Team is updated with identifier {{ param }}
team.deleted: A Team is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Team {{ id }}?

team.representingHelp: The guild/organization/school you are representing. For example: Tampereen TietoTeekkarikilta or Tampere University of Technology.

request.title: Confirm membership request
request.question: Are you sure you want to request an invitation to this team? You can't join multiple teams and can't make more membership requests while you have a pending one.

decline.title: Confirm membership declination
decline.question: Are you sure you want to decline this membership request?

team.membershipRequiredInfo: You can't request a team membership until you've added your personal details in the settings menu. Go to settings-page and fill your personal details to request membership.
team.name: Name
team.captainNotice: NOTICE: You become the captain of the team that you create. Only the captain (adn admins) can change team details and accept/decline membership requests
team.authorizationNotice: Teams are manually accepted by admins and they won't appear in the team listing before they are accepted
